author: Danielle
text: I ordered a G Shock watch for my partners birthday, the parcel arrived, I wrapped it up for his birthday and when he opened it there was no watch in the box, ruined his birthday completely, emailed Stock X and still no response

text: Horrible customer service!!! The only way to contact anyone is thru email and even then the customer service via emails sucks!!  I will NEVER use or recommend StockX!

author: Gregory Sapojnikov
text: I ordered my shoes from StockX 3 weeks ago and they havent even been delivered to stockx for verification. I understand there is a supply chain issue going on, however I havent been contacted with an update in 2 weeks regarding my order. This is very frustrating considering I paid over $350.
title: I ordered my shoes from StockX 3 weeks…

text: I ordered a pair of shoes last March 14. And it was cancelled last March 24 without sending me an email that it was cancelled. I only knew about it because I received a refund on my credit card.
